text.tspan: Tuberculosis death rate, by age, World
The estimated death rate from tuberculosis per 100,000 people in each age group.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: Data includes tuberculosis deaths in HIV-negative people. Tuberculosis deaths among people with HIV are classified under
